Roundtable: ‘Sunsetting’ – On Digital Praxes of Letting Go

Participants in this closing conversation—Vincent Brown, Laurent Dubois, Schuyler Esprit, and Holly Bynoe—discuss what it means to be “finished” with a potentially perpetually available digital project. Having curated and maintained Caribbean digital spaces for a variety of audiences, they each consider questions of the sustainability, ephemerality, evolution, and afterlives—planned and unexpected—of these spaces. This panel will be moderated by Alex Gil.
